robot.name: robotDriver
robot.script:
timeouts(15000) open('notepad.exe') window('Untitled - Notepad') sendKeys('sometext')
sendKeys(Keys.ENTER, Keys.ENTER) sendKeys('sometext') sendKeys(Keys.chord(Keys.CONTROL, Keys.HOME))
/* keyboard().pressKey(Keys.CONTROL) keyboard().pressKey('a') keyboard().releaseKey('a') keyboard().releaseKey(Keys.CONTROL) */
keyboard().pressKey(Keys.SHIFT) sendKeys(Keys.DOWN, Keys.DOWN) keyboard().releaseKey(Keys.SHIFT)
sleep(2000)
